## ParagraphStyle class

Represents the styling that is applied to paragraph content.

**Signature:**

```typescript
/** @sealed */
export declare class ParagraphStyle extends ParagraphStyleBase implements Readonly<ParagraphStyleProps> 
```
**Extends:** ParagraphStyleBase

**Implements:** Readonly&lt;[ParagraphStyleProps](./scribing.paragraphstyleprops.md)<!-- -->&gt;
